charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-MANUFACTURE; deft did knowingly and intentionally attempt to manufacture methamphetamine, a controlled drug substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft. is committed to the custody of the U. S. Bureau of Prisons for imprisonment for 21 months. Deft. to serve a term of supervised release of 4 yrs with special conditions. Deft. to pay a special assessment of $50.00. No fine imposed. Deft. remanded to custody of U. S. Marshal. (1)

charges.charge_description: Deft did knowingly and intentionally attempt to manufacture methamphetamine, a controlled drug substance. [4:92-m-505]

charges.charge_disposition: Deft. is committed to the custody of the U. S. Bureau of Prisons for imprisonment for 21 months. Deft. to serve a term of supervised release of 4 yrs with special conditions. Deft. to pay a special assessment of $50.00. No fine imposed. Deft. remanded to custody of U. S. Marshal. (-1)
